verses.verse: And Adam <WH120> knew <WH3045> <WH8804> <WH853> Havah <WH2332> his wife <WH802>; and she conceived <WH2029> <WH8799>, and bare <WH3205> <WH8799> <WH853> Kayin <WH7014>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, I have gotten <WH7069> <WH8804> a man <WH376> from <WH854> the YY <WH3068>.

And she again <WH3254> <WH8686> bare <WH3205> <WH8800> his brother <WH251> Hevel <WH1893>. And Hevel <WH1893> was a keeper <WH7462> <WH8802> of sheep <WH6629>, but Kayin <WH7014> was a tiller <WH5647> <WH8802> of the ground <WH127>.
And in process <WH7093> of time <WH3117> it came to pass, that Kayin <WH7014> brought <WH935> <WH8686> of the fruit <WH6529> of the ground <WH127> an offering <WH4503> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And Hevel <WH1893>, he <WH1931> also brought <WH935> <WH8689> of the firstlings <WH1062> of his flock <WH6629> and of the fat <WH2459> thereof. And the YY <WH3068> had respect <WH8159> <WH8799> unto Hevel <WH1893> and to his offering <WH4503>:

But unto Kayin <WH7014> and to his offering <WH4503> he had not respect <WH8159> <WH8804>. And Kayin <WH7014> was very <WH3966> wroth <WH2734> <WH8799>, and his countenance <WH6440> fell <WH5307> <WH8799>.
And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Kayin <WH7014>, Why art thou wroth <WH2734> <WH8804>? and why is thy countenance <WH6440> fallen <WH5307> <WH8804> ?

If <WH518> thou doest well <WH3190> <WH8686>, shalt thou not be accepted <WH7613>? and if thou doest not well <WH3190> <WH8686>, sin <WH2403> lieth <WH7257> <WH8802> at the door <WH6607>. And unto thee shall be his desire <WH8669>, and thou shalt rule <WH4910> <WH8799> over him.

And Kayin <WH7014> talked <WH559> <WH8799> with <WH413> Hevel <WH1893> his brother <WH251>: and it came to pass, when they were in the field <WH7704>, that Kayin <WH7014> rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> against <WH413> Hevel <WH1893> his brother <WH251>, and slew him <WH2026> <WH8799>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Kayin <WH7014>, Where <WH335> is Hevel <WH1893> thy brother <WH251>? And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I know <WH3045> <WH8804> not: Am I my brother's <WH251> keeper <WH8104> <WH8802> ?
And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, What <WH4100> hast thou done <WH6213> <WH8804>? the voice <WH6963> of thy brother's <WH251> blood <WH1818> crieth <WH6817> <WH8802> unto me from the ground <WH127>.

And now art thou cursed <WH779> <WH8803> from the earth <WH127>, which hath opened <WH6475> <WH8804> her mouth <WH6310> to receive <WH3947> <WH8800> thy brother's <WH251> blood <WH1818> from thy hand <WH3027>;

When <WH3588> thou tillest <WH5647> <WH8799> the ground <WH127>, it shall not henceforth <WH3254> <WH8686> yield <WH5414> <WH8800> unto thee her strength <WH3581>; a fugitive <WH5128> <WH8801> and a vagabond <WH5110> <WH8802> shalt thou be in the earth <WH776>.
And Kayin <WH7014> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, My punishment <WH5771> is greater <WH1419> than I can bear <WH5375> <WH8800>.

Behold, thou hast driven me out <WH1644> <WH8765> this day <WH3117> from the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>; and from <WH5921> thy face <WH6440> shall I be hid <WH5641> <WH8735>; and I shall be a fugitive <WH5128> <WH8801> and a vagabond <WH5110> <WH8802> in the earth <WH776>; and it shall come to pass <WH1961> <WH8804>, that every one that findeth me <WH4672> <WH8802> shall slay me <WH2026> <WH8799>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Therefore <WH3651> whosoever slayeth <WH2026> <WH8802> Kayin <WH7014>, vengeance shall be taken <WH5358> <WH8714> on him sevenfold <WH7659>. And the YY <WH3068> set <WH7760> <WH8799> a mark <WH226> upon Kayin <WH7014>, lest <WH1115> any finding <WH4672> <WH8802> him should kill <WH5221> <WH8687> him.
And Kayin <WH7014> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> from the presence <WH6440> of the YY <WH3068>, and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in the land <WH776> of Nod <WH5113>, on the east <WH6926> of Eden <WH5731>.

And Kayin <WH7014> knew <WH3045> <WH8799> his wife <WH802>; and she conceived <WH2029> <WH8799>, and bare <WH3205> <WH8799> Hanokh <WH2585>: and he builded <WH1129> <WH8802> a city <WH5892>, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892>, after the name <WH8034> of his son <WH1121>, Hanokh <WH2585>.

And unto Hanokh <WH2585> was born <WH3205> <WH8735> Irad <WH5897>: and Irad <WH5897> begat <WH3205> <WH8804> Mehujael <WH4232>: and Mehujael <WH4232> begat <WH3205> <WH8804> Methusael <WH4967>: and Methusael <WH4967> begat <WH3205> <WH8804> Lamech <WH3929>.
And Lamech <WH3929> took <WH3947> <WH8799> unto him two <WH8147> wives <WH802>: the name <WH8034> of the one <WH259> was Adah <WH5711>, and the name <WH8034> of the other <WH8145> Zillah <WH6741>.
And Adah <WH5711> bare <WH3205> <WH8799> Jabal <WH2989>: he was the father <WH1> of such as dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> in tents <WH168>, and of such as have cattle <WH4735>.
And his brother's <WH251> name <WH8034> was Jubal <WH3106>: he was the father <WH1> of all such as handle <WH8610> <WH8802> the harp <WH3658> and organ <WH5748>.

And Zillah <WH6741>, she also bare <WH3205> <WH8804> Tubalcain <WH8423>, an instructer <WH3913> <WH8803> of every artificer <WH2794> in brass <WH5178> and iron <WH1270>: and the sister <WH269> of Tubalcain <WH8423> was Naamah <WH5279>.

And Lamech <WH3929> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his wives <WH802>, Adah <WH5711> and Zillah <WH6741>, Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> my voice <WH6963>; ye wives <WH802> of Lamech <WH3929>, hearken <WH238> <WH8685> unto my speech <WH565>: for I have slain <WH2026> <WH8804> a man <WH376> to my wounding <WH6482>, and a young man <WH3206> to my hurt <WH2250>.
If <WH3588> Kayin <WH7014> shall be avenged <WH5358> <WH8714> sevenfold <WH7659>, truly Lamech <WH3929> seventy <WH7657> and sevenfold <WH7651>.

And Adam <WH120> knew <WH3045> <WH8799> his wife <WH802> again <WH5750>; and she bare <WH3205> <WH8799> a son <WH1121>, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> his name <WH8034> SHet <WH8352>: For 'Elohim <WH430>, said she, hath appointed <WH7896> <WH8804> me another <WH312> seed <WH2233> instead <WH8478> of Hevel <WH1893>, whom <WH3588> Kayin <WH7014> slew <WH2026> <WH8804>.

And to SHet <WH8352>, to him <WH1931> also there was born <WH3205> <WH8795> a son <WH1121>; and he called <WH7121> <WH8799> his name <WH8034> Enos <WH583>: then began men <WH2490> <WH8717> to call <WH7121> <WH8800> upon the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>.
